Package controllers

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.UserController
  • public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    The UserController class is a controller class for managing user-related operations. It provides methods to generate messages for database operations related to users, such as logging out, selecting users, selecting users by specific criteria, and selecting associated data with users (e.g., questions, courses). The class serves as an intermediary between the user interface and the database, facilitating the retrieval and manipulation of user data.
